name: Apphive Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile application builder platform intended to help users to create easy-friendly applications without any coding knowledge. The company's platform offers components like a database, GPS, camera, and geolocation that can be dragged, dropped, customized, and published at one's convenience, enabling clients to easily create applications needed for their business.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application builder platform intended to help users to create easy-friendly applications without any coding knowledge. The company's platform offers components like a database, GPS, camera, and geolocation that can be dragged, dropped, customized, and published at one's convenience, enabling clients to easily create applications needed for their business.
